name: create_document
description: Create a new Google Doc with the specified title and optional content

title.description: The title of the new document

content.description: Initial content to add to the document (optional)

folder_id.description: Google Drive folder ID to create the document in (optional)

name: read_document
description: Read the content of a Google Doc by its ID

document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc to read

name: update_document
description: Update the content of an existing Google Doc - replaces the entire content

document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc to update

content.description: The new content to replace the document with

name: append_to_document
description: Append content to the end of an existing Google Doc

document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc to append to

content.description: The content to append to the document

name: list_documents
description: List Google Docs, optionally filtered by folder or search query

folder_id.description: Google Drive folder ID to list documents from (optional)

limit.description: Maximum number of documents to return (default: 20)

name: search_drive
description: Search Google Drive for files matching a query

file_type.description: Type of files to search for (default: any)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 20)
